name: Legolas
description: A Woodland elf prince whose extraordinary archery skills and agile grace make him a deadly warrior. His keen elven senses and light-hearted nature provide both tactical advantage and moments of levity to the Fellowship. Through his deep friendship with Gimli, he helps bridge the ancient divide between elves and dwarves, while his connection to nature and incredible combat abilities make him an invaluable member of the quest.

features.name: Fighting Style: Archery
features.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls made with ranged weapons

features.name: Second Wind
features.description: Once per short rest, bonus action to regain 1d10 + fighter level HP

biography.appearance: A tall, graceful elf with long blonde hair and keen eyes, wearing light armor adorned with woodland motifs
biography.backstory: Prince of the Woodland Realm and son of King Thranduil, skilled in both bow and blade
biography.personalityTraits: Light-hearted and agile, with keen senses and deadly accuracy
biography.ideals: To protect the natural world and stand against the forces of darkness
biography.bonds: Loyal to his people and his companions in the Fellowship
biography.flaws: Sometimes shows disdain for those he considers less graceful or skilled
